docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. import torch import pytorch_lightning as pl Deployment git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push -u origin main && mkdocs gh-deploy --force
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
